name: Emperial Knights
description:
You incarnate as a powerful knight to help the Emperials to defeat the darkness in the Tower of Infinite game mode. You will vanquish waves of monsters to reach the bosses and claim your loot with your friends or alone.

Features:

Classes : Create your own character with a progression. The classes are : Warrior, Ranger, Mage, Assassin, Pistolero.

Parkour : You can wall climb/run or slide anything, anytime.

Tower of Infinite : Spawning waves of monsters and bosses infinitely.

PVP : Press Tab, Hover your mouse on your friend and Press P in order to duel them on a deadly duel.

Party : Group up with your friends and start an adventure together.

Local Multiplayer : Host and Join games via IP address.
